location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in Bushire, to unknown recipient.

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item is missing all but the final paragraph, date and signature. It has suffered slightly from insect damage but the remaining portion is still clearly readable.Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right corner of the page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.

mods.abstract: The letter is incomplete, containing only the end paragraph, in which Stannus requests a reply to an unknown question.
